duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively seek out brand new customers and engage with decision makers to uncover their needs.
Utilize prospecting techniques to effectively engage customers and build relationships.
Deliver persuasive presentations and storytelling to impress key decision makers with industry and product knowledge.
Identify and meet customer needs, offering best solutions.
Develop and prioritize a pipeline of opportunity beyond what is needed to achieve sales goals.
Attend initial in-person training and ongoing virtual weekly product trainings to stay informed on industry trends and NAVEX’s solutions.
Negotiate and close opportunities to meet sales quota.
